RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 3, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000( Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AULD LANGE SYNE vied for the lead two wide, drew on even terms for the lead midway on the second turn, battled to the wire and proved best by a narrow margin under left handed urging. NOBLE BEHAVIOR away alertly, set the pace into the far turn, matched strides with the winner the balance of the trip and just missed hanging on. SAY HEY KID moved up three wide before a half then leveled off. GILES failed to menace. KARAMEL CORN chased the pace along the inside for six furlongs then weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Karamel Corn
ENTRY.OWNER: Fulwiler Heather Fulwiler Richard Tieman Diane M and Hutson Bernard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, long drive, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w, drew even 2nd turn, long drive, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Norman G. Lewis & Laurence Lewis

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered FoalsP referred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURBIE prompted the pace along the rail for three and one half furlongs, made the lead, shook clear before the furlong marker and prevailed under mild urging. JUMP INTO SANITY trailed for three furlongs, closed with a rapid move three wide into the stretch and finished second best. UNESCORTED allowed to settle, found her best stride late inside. PASSINGTHEMISTERY set a pressured pace two wide to the quarter pole then weakened. DA JOURNEYGIRL hopped at the start, had speed into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Turbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Passingthemistery
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Into Sanity
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, quick move, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Da Journeygirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, close early, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late inside,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 25400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECKLESS L J vied for the lead along the inside for a half, shifted out to the two path, rallied between horses to make the lead past the furlong marker and won under mild urging. ROSCO P. COLTRANE trailed down the backstretch, circled rivals four wide with a rapid move on the turn, drew on even terms for the lead before the furlong marker then was no match for the winner. CLASSIC MO prompted the pace two wide for a half, drifted to the five path and was outfinished. SWEET LEMON DROP failed to menace. SHOW SLIDING HOME well placed, failed to respond. OHIO EAGLE close up early, dropped back on the turn. NEBULOSA sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Lemon Drop
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, quick move 4 wide turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 1/4 pole, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless L J
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled 2 wide 1/4 pole, got through, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted, 5path top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race SinceJune 3 A llowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir

RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLIFTONS BALLERINA away alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and prevailed under right handed urging. THE DEVIL'S DREAM drifted out at the start, pressured the winner along the rail into the turn, dropped back, altered course to the five path entering the stretch then came on again late. TWERK close up four wide, went evenly. OUT FOR FUN bumped soon after the start, angled out five wide soon thereafter and was no threat. DANZA MAGIC bumped then was in tight between rivals at the start and failed to reach contention. PROPHETESS bumped at the start, chased the winner two wide through the turn, drifted out to the six path and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, pressed inside, angled 5p, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Danza Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, in tight start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetess
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased 2 wide, drifted 6path, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, drifted 5wide, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Twerk
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Cliftons Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR ENTERTAINER had his head turned at the start, trailed for over a half mile, closed rapidly three wide through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. CENTSOFWANDER never far back, surged to the lead with a quick move three wide on the far turn, battled the balance of the trip and just missed hanging on. CYCLONE pressed the pace three, two wide then along the inside, dueled the length of the stretch but was outfinished. R CARDINAL PRINCE close up, drifted to the six path entering the stretch giving up ground then came on again late. BOSS BEAR pressed the early pace two wide, dueled through the far turn then weakened. SCRATCHOFF broke in front, set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly five furlongs then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Star Entertainer
ENTRY.COMMENT: head turned start, trailed, closed fast, 3 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, drifted 6path, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, quick move, 3 wide 2nd turn, narrow lead, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, dueled 2 wide 1/4 pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3wide, inside, battled late, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 3 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACROSS THE AISLE never far back, closed willingly five wide into the stretch, gained a slight lead before the furlong marker and proved best under right handed urging. MASTER OF WAR trailed into the stretch, swung wide and closed determinedly in the middle of the racetrack to finish clear for second. NOT YET CHARLIE close up from the start, offered a mild bid four wide on the far turn, matched strides into the stretch then was outfinished. MY TWO AUNT JOANS unhurried early, loomed boldly four wide in upper stretch then leveled off. JACK'S ADVANTAGE vied for the lead along the inside into the far turn, checked when in tight nearing the quarter pole, came on again rapidly along the rail before the furlong marker but was outfinished. WHISKEY ROAN chased the pace into the stretch then weakened. WAR NOVEL away alertly, set the pace in the two path past the quarter pole then folded. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Across the Aisle
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 5 wide, long drive, all out,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pollock Farms, Hugh Owen, T & CKentucky, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: War Novel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed willingly mid track

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, loomed boldly 4 wide, upper stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Roan
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Advantage
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, in tight, checked 1/4p, came again rail, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (OhioR egistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY SAINT away alertly, set all the pace under pressure, drifted to the five path entering the stretch and proved best under mild urging. SUSIE'S KID trailed into the turn, rallied outside and finished second best. DARK TIMBER pressured the winner three wide into the stretch, was forced out to the six path by that one, angled in when struck with a right handed crop near the furlong marker then was outfinished while two wide. BROTHER SKYE never far back steadied behind DARK TIMER near mid stretch then finished evenly. MUTINY pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. THE RIDER OF BROTHER SKYE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF DARK TIMBER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, steadied mid stretch, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 4 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mutiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2 wide, drifted 5path top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Timber
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Charles W and Love David
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3w, carried 6p top lane, angled in mid stretch, outfinish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming RacesFor $12, 500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERGER stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead before the furlong marker two wide and proved best under confident handling. STEALTH MODE broke in front, dueled for the lead two ide then inside the winner and finished second best. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT allowed to settle, passed a tiring rival in the three path in deep stretch. MARGARITA CINCO hopped at the start and was no threat. MAP TO MY HEART dueled for the lead along the inside into the turn and was through after a half. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ was no threat. THE KID'S PRAYER was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Map to My Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Margarita Cinco
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, well back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Dominique's Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, passed tiring rival 3path

ENTRY.NAME: The Kid's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Serger
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide turn, long drive, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Stealth Mode
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 2 wide, inside, second best,
